name: Alter (affigueir, Matinhos)
description:
Alter is a 3D first-person puzzle game where you play as Layla, a student who was kidnapped and submitted to experiments by a shady organization. After these experiments, she ended up with two extra personalities inside her, Jack and Arthur, and gained a polymorphic body that adapts to each Alter. Use polymorphism and the help of your alters to solve the puzzles and find a way to escape this organization.

Controls

Move: WASD                            Alter Selection: Q, E

Crouch: CTRL, C (Toggle)        Inventory: TAB

Jump: Space                             Interact: F

Sprint: Shift                              Skip Dialogue: N

Cheats

F1 - Open all doors.

F3 - Turn on all alters.

F4 - Teleport to night facility bedroom.

F5 - Teleport to night facility.
